name: 鄭瑞清
objective:
5G 行動通訊中的一個重要特色為使用毫米波頻帶，和傳統低於 6 GHz 的頻帶相比十分不同，使得 RF 元件從設計到量測都需要有不同的考量。本課程除介紹 5G 行動通訊的基本概念外，課程內容包含毫米波天線設計，以及電磁模擬軟體和量測儀器實務操作，希望能培養理論和實務兼備的學生。
One important feature of 5G mobile communication is the use of millimeter-wave frequency bands, which are significantly different from conventional sub-6 GHz bands. Therefore, it is necessary to have different consideration from design to measurement of RF components. This course introduces the fundamental concepts of 5G mobile communication, millimeter-wave antenna design and operations of electromagnetic simulation software and test equipment. It is expected that this course can train students not only in theory but also in practice.
schedule:
1-3. Introduction to 5G Mobile Communications
4. Antenna Theory
5. ntroduction to Finite Element Method
6. Practical Antenna Design Experience
7. Introduction to High-Directive Antennas
8-9 Millimeter-wave Leaky Antenna Simulation Laboratory
10. Millimeter-wave Array Antenna for Mobile Terminals
11-12. Millimeter-wave Array Antenna for Mobile Terminals Laboratory
13. Characteristics of Millimeter-wave Propagation
14-15. Millimeter-wave High-directive Antenna Design Laboratory
16. Beam-switching Array Antennas
17-18. Millimeter-wave High-directive Antenna Measurement Laboratory
materials: Reference: Warren L. Stutzman, Gary A. Thiele, "Antenna Theory and Design, 3rd Edition," John Wiley & Sons.
